alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Custer; Haakon; Jackson; Meade; Oglala Lakota; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 11:12PM MDT until July 11 at 12:30AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Haakon County in west central South Dakota... South central Meade County in west central South Dakota... Northeastern Custer County in southwestern South Dakota... Northeastern Oglala Lakota County in southwestern South Dakota... Jackson County in southwestern South Dakota... North central Bennett County in southwestern South Dakota... Southeastern Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 1230 AM MDT. * At 1111 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles north of Wasta to Scenic, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Wall around 1125 PM MDT. Quinn and Delta 9 Missile Silo around 1130 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Cottonwood, Interior, Potato Creek, Kadoka, Wanblee, Eagle Nest Butte, Intersection of Highway 73 and White River, and Long Valley. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 90 and 172. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Bennett; Custer; Haakon; Jackson; Meade; Oglala Lakota; Pennington
